DOC.brief_summary: Falls , high prevalence , high risk consequent medical social cost , important issue medical care health promotion elderly . The prevalence fall elderly lie 10-20 % . Falls become second leading cause death injury elderly Taiwan . A community-based study show , among old adult fall , 27.3 % severely injured , 53.9 % get minor injury , 18.9 % remain intact . Another study reveal among fall injury event report , 42 % hospitalize , 2.2 % die hospital , 37 % enter nursing home discharge hospital . In addition physical discomfort , half elderly faller would become disabled , bring heavy burden social economy family care . It estimate 460 thousand old people fall , 125 thousand injure Taiwan , 2007 . Research evidence show fall prevention effective feasible . Although primary fall prevention program conduct community level extend 25 county city many year , integrate secondary tertiary prevention . The study aim establish integrated fall prevention model , combine primary , secondary tertiary prevention . The model practice participate hospital community , randomize control trial ( RCT ) design examine feasibility effectiveness . Our study subject person age 65 live community , go out-patient department ( OPD ) emergency room ( ER ) care . Tasks implementation 1 . To organize multidisciplinary team integrate fall prevention . 2 . To draft guideline fall prevention elderly . 3 . To set multidisciplinary fall clinic . 4 . To set fall prevention classroom . 5 . To enhance cooperate hospital primary care unit fulfill guideline fall prevention elderly .
DOC.brief_title: Establishment Integrated Model Prevention Elderly Falls
